definition.text: Verify that the Production Trading Tasks tasks for the corresponding Market were created successfully.

translations.text: Verifica que las tareas Production Trading Tasks se crearon con éxito para el Market correspondiente.
Überprüfen Sie, ob die Production Trading Tasks für den entsprechenden Market erfolgreich erstellt wurden.
İlgili borsa ( Market ) için Üretim Ticareti Görevlerinin ( Production Trading Tasks ) başarıyla oluşturulduğunu doğrulayın.
Убедитесь, что задачи Production Trading Tasks для соответствующего Market были успешно созданы.

paragraphs.text: Look for the following data structures:

translations.text: Busca las siguientes estructuras de datos:

paragraphs.text: A Market Trading Tasks node for the new market.

translations.text: Un Market Trading Tasks nodo para el nuevo mercado.
Ein Market Trading Tasks Knoten für den neuen Markt.
Yeni borsa için bir Borsa Ticaret Görevleri ( Market Trading Tasks ) düğümü.
Узел Market Trading Tasks для нового рынка.

paragraphs.text: One Trading Mine Tasks node for each trading mine included in the workspace.

translations.text: Ein Knoten Trading Mine Tasks für jede im Arbeitsbereich enthaltene Handelsmine.
Çalışma alanına dahil edilen her ticaret madeni için bir Ticaret Madeni Görevleri ( Trading Mine Tasks ) düğümü.
Один узел Trading Mine Tasks для каждого Trading Mine, включенного в рабочее пространство (Workspace).

paragraphs.text: One Task Manager per Trading Mine and one Task with a Live Trading Session for each Trading System in the workspace.

translations.text: Un Task Manager por Trading Mine y un Task con una Backtesting Session para cada Trading System en el espacio de trabajo.
Ein Task Manager pro Trading Mine und eine Task mit einer Live Trading Session für jedes Trading System im Arbeitsbereich.

Ticaret Madeni ( Trading Mine ) başına bir Görev Yöneticisi ( Task Manager ) ve çalışma alanındaki her Ticaret Sistemi ( Trading System ) için Canlı Ticaret Oturumu ( Live Trading Session ) içeren bir Görev ( Task ).
Один менеджер задач (Task Manager) на каждый Trading Mine и одна задача (Task) с Live Trading Session для каждой торговой системы в рабочем пространстве (Workspace).
